body.name: SheaMoisture Hair Conditioner Curly Hair Products, Coconut & Hibiscus Curl & Shine Conditioner, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Neem Oil, Frizz Control, Family Size (2-Pack, 16 Fl Oz Ea)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 50 mins
features: SHEA BUTTER CONDITIONER FOR CURLY HAIR: Shea Moisture Coconut and Hibiscus Conditioner smooths dry, curly hair cuticles for less frizz and flyaways without weighing hair down.

CURL & SHINE CURLY HAIR CONDITIONER: Use curly conditioner daily after shampooing to restore moisture without weighing hair down. Hair is more manageable with fewer tangles, knots, and snarls. Leaves hair soft with bouncy curls.

COCONUT OIL & HIBISCUS FLOWERS: Formulated with coconut oil with Vitamin E, K, iron, and fatty acids as well as emollient hibiscus flowers, these ingredients are ideal in a coconut conditioner to deliver shine while helping reduce hair breakage.

ALL HAIR TYPES: All hair types, especially curly hair, benefit from the Coconut & Hibiscus Curl & Shine sulfate free shampoo and conditioner set with organic shea butter. Hair is soft and smooth with healthy body.

NEEM OIL & SILK PROTEIN: Neem oil and silk protein work together for beautiful coconut curls in our curly hair products to restore moisture, strengthen and help protect hair strands from breakage, snapping, or splitting, and restore hair's shine.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #34,956 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #819 in Hair Conditioner

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shea Moisture Curl & Shine Shampoo is a sulfate-free gentle cleanser that improves hair health and restores shine.

Curls That Bounce Get shiny, bouncy, and unbelievably manageable hair with this Curl & Shine Shampoo. Together, We Give Back With every purchase, you support our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Tried, True & Cruelty-Free Tested on friends & family for generations—never on an animal. SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker We honor the vision of this pioneering mother and entrepreneur by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this brand and have been using them for a while. Super good for my curly hair and makes them so soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for super curly kids hair
reviews.reviewText: One the few products that doesn’t have bad ingredients !!! Amazing on my daughters hair ! Works magic !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is so thick....it is great....I have to put the bottle upside down for it to come out it is so thick, but that is what I want for my hair....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best curl conditioner out there!
reviews.reviewText: This is by far my favorite conditioner for my curl. It is so moisturing for dry hair, doesn’t weigh down, decreases frizz, and increases shine, softness, and definition. After years for trying to find a good conditioner and trying many more expensive brands, this is the answer! Relatively inexpensive and SUCH A GREAT PRODUCT. I can’t stress enough how much this conditioner has improved my curls, wish I could give it a 10 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves it
reviews.reviewText: My daughter's favorite shampoo for extra moisturized hair. Like these bottles better than the ones at the store. This stuff works wonders for dry hair and smells great. Only downfall was one of the bottles spilled out some in the package and was a bit messy upon opening

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for frizzy, unruly curly hair
reviews.reviewText: The product is GREAT. I've been using it for a few years now & it has definitely helped hydrate my hair. It's very noticable. Even my hairdresser comments on it. I combine it with the leave in conditioner after washing it & it really helps with the frizz. (I live in a hot/humid area).My ONLY complaint about this order is that the order got "lost" & showed up weeks after it was suppose to be delivered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for curly hair
reviews.reviewText: I tried so many products and was so frustrated when my hair changed from straight to curly. I have thin, fine, curly hair. This product is the best I have found for my hair. Does not weigh my hair down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I, like everyone else on the internet, discovered in the last year that I actually have wavy hair. My hair is SUPER dry and only holds the wave when it is adequately moisturized. I use this conditioner every single time I wash and it’s the only one I’ve found that is both lightweight enough and sufficiently moisturizing. I love it, and buying these larger bottles is the best deal.
